name: altivities
description: Activities & games for teaching as an ALT

scripts.build-copy: copyfiles --up 1 source/**/*.css source/**/*.html source/**/*.jpg source/**/*.js source/**/*.json source/**/*.md source/**/*.mp3 source/**/*.pdf source/**/*.png source/**/*.svg source/**/*.woff2 docs
scripts.build-pdfs: md-to-pdf docs/abcrace/README.md docs/bingo/README.md docs/cards/README.md docs/clock/README.md docs/kanarace/README.md docs/memory/README.md docs/order/README.md docs/parfait/README.md docs/pizza/README.md docs/sentences/README.md docs/wordlists/README.md

author: Kent Rasmussen
